overview:
Giles O’Brien is the very essence of optimism.

He truly believes even at the age of 57 that he’ll be discovered. In reality he already has, but not by any radio talent scout.

No, mostly he has established himself on the radars of the scam marriages bureau in the UK, the British Inland Revenue and is one of the few people in the world to have a fatwa put on him by the Jehovah’s Witnesses.
